NK040(thi)019:1: // +aahmh'u chos sku dbyings kyi yum chen la gsol ba 'debs //
NK040(thi)019:2: byin rlabs sems la 'jug par byin gyis rlobs //
NK040(thi)019:3: longs sku rdo rje phag mo la gsol sprul sku
NK040(thi)019:4: ma cig lab sgron la hah rdo rje rigs kyi
NK040(thi)019:5: mkha' 'gro la rih rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro
NK040(thi)019:6: nih pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro la sah las kyi
NK040(thi)019:7: rigs kyi mkha' 'gro la bamh sangs rgyas rigs kyi
NK040(thi)019:8: mkha' 'gro la pha rgyud thabs kyi brgyud pa la
NK040(thi)019:9: ma rgyud shes rabs kyi brgyud pa la sras rgyud
NK040(thi)019:10: nyams myong gis brgyud pa la zab mo gcod kyi
NK040(thi)019:11: brgyud pa la rgyu 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
NK040(thi)019:12: gsum // dug gsum rnam rtog yal du gsol //
NK040(thi)019:13: rkyen pho gdon mo gdon klu gdon gsum //
NK040(thi)019:14: gdon gsum rnam rtog zhi gyur cig /
NK040(thi)019:15: chos sku longs sku sprul sku gsum //
NK040(thi)019:16: sku gsum mngon du gyur par shog /
NK040(thi)019:17: phyi 'khor 'das kyi snang ba sna tshogs pa //
NK040(thi)019:18: nang rang sems stong pa'i rang rtsal ste //
NK040(thi)019:19: de thog mtha' dbus med ngos bzung med //
NK040(thi)019:20: yul sems kyi gzung 'dzin gzhi rtsa bral //
NK040(thi)019:21: rang byung gi ye shes rang gsal la //
NK040(thi)019:22: spang blang dang re dog ma mchis pas //
NK040(thi)019:23: gshis rang bab snyem med so ma la //
NK040(thi)019:24: gnad gcer mthong rang grol mngon gyur shog /
NK040(thi)019:26: shwa lo ka gnyis si tus gsungs //
NK040(thi)019:27: kha skong sa man+ta yi sab //
